PinkGlyphDetectionRange.Description: Range in which the Glyph becomes visible and can see the survivor

PinkGlyphInteractionDuration.Description: Duration of the interaction to activate the glyph

PinkGlyphMovementRange.Description: Range that trigger teleportation if exited

PinkGlyphStatusEffectDuration.Description: Duration of the status effect when fully "marked"

PinkGlyphMarkProgressResetDelay.Description: Delay before the "marked" progress is reset when the survivor is not being "marked"
